Key Match Events: Jamal Murray led the Nuggets with 21 points on 13 shots and nine assists against two turnovers, while Russell Westbrook added 19 points on 16 shots with eight assists versus three turnovers.
Pre-Game Insights: Jamal Murray is learning Japanese using the Duolingo app and is on a 93-day streak, Russell Westbrook is also learning Japanese and is taking real classes.
Post-Match Reflections: Jamal Murray expressed his excitement about his daughter's development and how she will soon be able to play basketball with him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nikola Jokic missed his second straight game with an illness, and DeAndre Jordan made his first start of the season in Jokic's place.
Others: Jamal Murray and Russell Westbrook are getting the hang of sharing the court together in their first season as teammates.
